author: bsullivan
msg: Make PartialClasses public (though still with package private constructor) to work around a Java Introspection bug where when getMethod() is called on a public class for a  public final method inherited from a package private superclass, the returned Method object refers to the package private superclass and thus blows up when invoked outside of that package.
